parameters: I brought food for you. How's the living situation?
Well, despite the cramped space, I do have a bed, and-
It's nothing spectacular, but I was able to whip up some
fried rice with leftover ingredients. You can have some
By the way, what should I call you? I don't even have a
I know what it is I want to ask you.
Yeah, yeah, got it. Heavens, you are a really good cook.
Forgive my manners, I just...haven't been able to enjoy a
meal like this in quite some time.
P-please forgive me. I didn't mean to do that.
I need to know where Victor is.
Do you know what this sounds like?
Because I think that this sounds like an old fool making a
stupid mistake in order to get revenge for his-
Look, what I mean to say is that this plan is stupid. You
understand who he is, correct? You're fortunate to have been
able to escape from his grasp, married to a Ravenous and
I just need to do something I should have done a long time
I have to do it for her.
It seems as though he's planning something. I'm not sure
what, but it can't be good.
Revenge isn't going to do anything, you know. You don't have
to do this for your wife.
Thank you. For the food and shelter. It's warm.
There's some more fried rice there. I made just enough.
Now to check on the other hungry girl.
Wow... Even for me that was overkill... Haven't felt this
I'm kinda surprised he knew exactly the right amount of
Guess he still remembers from having his wife around.
Revenge isn't going to do anything, you know. You don't have
to do this for your wife.
I still wonder what he meant...
Maybe he's still available to talk?
Well, can't do anything with this in the way.
